description.value:
Your ranged attacks provide better support for your allies.

Prerequisites: Base attack bonus +6.

Benefit: When you take a standard action to provide @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#covering-fire]{covering fire} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#harrying-fire]{harrying fire}, you can choose to make your ranged attack roll against an AC of 25. If you hit, the effects of covering or harrying fire apply to the next two attacks made against the selected ally (for covering fire) or the selected foe (for harrying fire). You must decide if youâ€™re attempting to use this benefit or the normal benefit before you make the attack roll.
